fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE
PERSONAL DETAILS
Name
Nam Giang VU
Address
69/66 Ho Thi Ky, Ward 1, District 10, HCMC
Email namgivu@gmail.com
Mobile
+84 939 11 3993
CAREER OBJECTIVE
Coding is my life and deploying the outcome is my joyce. My objective is finding a good-paid job as a full-stack 
developer that would be my daily hobby and be my second family.
WORKING EXPERIENCES
Jan 2018 - now
Full-stack Developer, gigacover.com 
Python fullstack engineer especially on backend and devops for RESTful API with 
Falcon framework, SqlAlchemy as ORM, Postgres/MongoDb as database, and all 
under Linux OS as Ubuntu 16.04
Sep 2017 – Jan
2018
Full-stack Developer, Lazada TechHub & Lazada Vietnam
Develop & maintain multiple backend applications in the massive e-commerce 
eco-system of Lazada.
Technical skills to be 1) back-end API with Golang under the company internal 
framework, 2) old API consumers written in both Golang & PHP, and 3) develop new 
backend website(s) using PHP Zend 1 framewwork.
Jul 2016 – Jul 2017
Python Full-stack Developer, autonomous.ai
- (Front-end) Flask web application
- (Back-end) Flask API with MySQL and Postman
- Utilize AWS services to deploy apps via EC2 as hosting server, Elastic IP as static IP,
RDS as MySQL database server, S3 as public web assets, and ElasticCache as Redis 
cache. AWS cost optimized via IAM account and Cost Allocation Tag
- Python internal tool to deploy web app to AWS EC2
- Automation testing via Python Selenium WebDriver and Python Unittest; run against 
Selenium Grid via  SeleniumHQ Docker images
- Build Ubuntu staging hosts using Docker – used as internal testing/hosting 
environment
Jan 2015 – June 2016
Senior .Net Developer, FPT Software
Take part in outsourcing projects that work with customer from Texas USA.
Develop web application as requirement of a customer in Paris, France.
Technology in all is to use ASP.Net MVC 4.
Dec 2012 – Dec 2014
.Net Developer, Contemi Vietnam 
Researching & coding with the latest .Net technologies at the time i.e. WPF, ASP.Net 
MVC 3. Working under agile SCRUM project management and the western working 
culture.
Sep 2004 – Dec 2010
Lecturer, University of Science of HCMC
Teaching courses such as 1) Database Management System using MSSQL Server 
and 2) Data Structure and Algorithm. Developing teaching tools using Windows Form 
C# .Net
Research Intern at I2R, A*star, Singapore from 2007 to 2008
Page 1 of 3
EDUCATION BACKGROUND
2006 – 2009
University of Science of Ho Chi Minh City
Master Student view
2000 – 2004
University of Science of Ho Chi Minh City
Bachelor of Computer Science (ranking Excellent) certificate  transcript
1997 – 2000
High School for the Gifted, National University of Vietnam
(in Vietnamese Trường Phổ thông Năng khiếu)
High-school Diploma (ranking Good)
National Computer Competition (Encouraging Prize, 1998) certificate 
KEY SKILLS
Open-source stack
Python stack on Ubuntu Server and deploy to AWS EC2 instances
- Flask web as front-end
- Flask api and MySQL database as backend
- Deploy app via AWS services e.g. IAM account, EC2, Elastic IP, RDS, S3, ElasticCache
- Automation web testing via Python Selenium WebDriver with Selenium Grid (setup from 
SeleniumHQ Docker images)  view01 view02 view03
MySQL
- Fluently working with databases via SQL Workbench
- No problem with complex SQL queries
- Automated restore/backup database via mysqldump
Subversion via git on github, bitbucket, etc. view  
13k-points stackoverflow.com user view
and among the top-15 Vietnamese there view
AWS stack
Amazon Web Service aka. AWS
- Authorization for multiple user accounts via IAM service
- Deploy & maintain web/api application via EC2 instance and Elastic IP
- Maintain MySQL/MariaDb database instances via RDS service
- Also S3 storage used for web assets and database backup script
- Enhance web performance via Elastic Cache service as Redis
- Hand-on with Docker Swarm using ECS service
- Cost monitor and optimization via Cost Allocation Tag and Billing Report
Document and
Presentation
Proficient in using office software including MS Word, MS Excel, and MS PowerPoint.
Good skills in snapshot annotation tools by combining Pinta, GIMP, and Shutter.
Language skills
TOEIC certification 2015, grade 930, internal validation in FPT Software view
TOEFL iBT certification 2007, grade 86 view
Be able to communicate in English fluently in speaking & writing
- I have no difficulty in reading as well as writing technical reports.
- I have worked with many outsourcing projects, meetings online and offline with western 
customers from France, Australia, UK, Singapore.
- I have joined lots of SCRUM daily standup meetings, and four to five SCRUM planning 
meetings with western customer.
EXTRA CERTIFICATIONS
1
National Computer Competition (Encouraging Prize, 1998) certificate
2
SCRUM certification, PSM I 2014 certificate
3
TOEIC certification 2015, grade 930, internal validation in FPT Software certificate
4
TOEFL iBT certification 2007, grade 86 certificate
5
Office Computer Skills (excellent rank) - Computer Center of University of Education (2003)
Page 2 of 3
PERSONAL PROFILE
Most of all, I love the happy feeling in working; especially when completing meaningful tasks. In my free time, I
love to play history-related games.
I’m confident with my technical and English skills – working style to be smart and passionate software engineer.
I also have a good sense of humor – often do I make people around me happy and make friends with everyone.
Monthly I also hang out playing badminton/volley-ball with my friends; sometimes it’s nice to practice yoga. At
weekends, I enjoy shopping with my little happy family.
Page 3 of 3
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
